p: The findings from this study will be published and the data will also be included in subsequent larger trials if appropriate. Baseline data collected and summarised will include: participant gender, age, height, weight, body mass index, duration of symptoms, sporting activity, smoking/non-smoking, medication, any other musculoskeletal problems, EQ-5D, MOXFQ, VAS (pain), SAS score, VISA-A score and ultrasound findings (conventional ultrasound and UTC findings).
